intro: Fight, hide, or outsmart—only one will survive the Deathground.
description:
Deathground Simulator drops you into a brutal, prehistoric world where survival means outsmarting deadly predators. Stranded in a hostile jungle, you must use limited resources, craft tools, and rely on your wits to escape. The jungle is filled with ancient creatures that will hunt you down—outsmart them or become their prey.

As you explore abandoned outposts, you’ll uncover dark secrets and hear cryptic radio messages. But who can you trust?

Survival Features:
• Deadly Pursuit: Outsmart intelligent predators that relentlessly hunt you. Every move could be your last.
• Dangerous Territories: Explore eerie ruins, dense forests, and hidden places filled with danger and dark secrets.
• Craft to Survive: Collect resources, craft tools, and set traps to defend yourself against the threats that lurk.
• Adaptive Threats: Study predator behaviors and adjust your tactics as the danger evolves.
• Unravel the Mystery: Piece together cryptic radio signals and uncover the horrifying truth of the island’s past.
• Tension at Every Step: The jungle is always watching. Every sound, every shadow, could lead to your demise.

In Deathground Simulator, surviving isn’t just about escaping—it’s about uncovering the terrifying truth hidden in the heart of the wilderness.
